story_arceus_04_09000/2401_1101_0100_20: On the day of the Arceus Cup...
story_arceus_04_09000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Have you noticed any signs of your arc suit
awakening?
story_arceus_04_09000/2401_1001_0500_10: I’ll definitely awaken it during this match!
story_arceus_04_09000/2401_1001_0600_10: Ah, so you haven’t awakened it yet.
story_arceus_04_09000/2401_1001_0700_10:
That means you’re not ready to show a
bond strong enough for Arceus’s recognition!
story_arceus_04_09000/2401_1101_0800_20: Both Trainers are staring each other down.
